official_title: A Randomized, Observer-blind, Placebo-controlled, Multicenter, Phase 3 Study to Assess the Efficacy, Safety, and Immunogenicity of a Plant-Derived Quadrivalent Virus-Like Particles Influenza Vaccine in Adults 18-64 Years of Age
inclusion_criteria:
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
